OrgName: LexisNexis Risk Solutions, operating through LexisNexis Risk Holdings Inc. and LexisNexis Risk Data Management Inc. and their subsidiaries
activities: LexisNexis Risk Solutions receives personal information to provide data, analytics and technology services to help businesses and other entities assess, predict and manage risks as well as prevent and combat fraud in areas such as financial services, insurance, retail, health care and law enforcement.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
